title: फर्जी खबर: सुप्रीम कोर्ट के आदेश के बिना मोदी सरकार ने राम मंदिर का कार्य प्रारम्भ कर दिया है
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: The Centre has gone to SC in a WP to seek release of the non – disputed part of RJB land of 67 acres to start immediate construction. My meeting last evening with HM I had a discussion on my approach. But Centre was keen to obtain prior permission to start construction
